summary: The history of fictional female heroes in Western media from Wonder Woman's creation onward.
cast: Lynda Carter|Jane Espenson|Kathleen Hanna|L.S. Kim|Shelby Knox|Carmela Lane|Mike Madrid|Andy Mangels|Katie Pineda|Trina Robbins|Gloria Steinem|Jennifer K. Stuller|Lindsay Wagner|Geena Davis|Farrah Fawcett|Kate Jackson|Dan Rather|Ronald Reagan
keywords: reference to wonder woman|comic book history|pop culture|female superhero|gender bias
title: Wonder Women! The Untold Story of American Superheroines
